page.title: 11Coniston Clubs & Activities
page.content: Coniston has a wide range of clubs for all ages and interests. {SPORTS CLUBS:}Football, Cricket, Tennis, Badminton, Swimming, Bowling, Hockey and Sailing. {SOCIAL CLUBS:}Women's Institute, Mother's Union, British Legion, and the Cameo Club - a weekly gathering for pensioners, held in Coniston Institute. For young people, there is {Crusaders, an interdenominational young people's Christian group. There are three age groups: Mini's (3-7yrs) who meet on Fridays from 5.30-6.00pm, Juniors (7-11yrs) who also meet on Fridays from 5.30-7.00pm, and Seniors, meeting on Wednesday and Sunday evenings. The group started in 1979, and has an average attendance of 55-60 per week. Activities: Games evenings, athletics, football,filmshows, camps and quizzes.
